text: Pen mam Klays yɨl mɨdeb olap sek abe agyokon, Taytus ayɨp mam olap ayɨp amebal. Ñɨn kuŋay mam anɨb ak nop wog ogɨnap ñɨl, chɨn nop nɨg yonok. Nɨg mɨdɨl, ne kɨles tɨmel gɨl wog anɨb ak gɨtep gak. Pen ne abe nɨgup, nɨbi pel gɨtep gɨpɨm. Gɨtep gɨpɨm anɨb ak, ne gos kɨles tɨmel gɨl nɨŋɨd, nɨb ayɨp wog gun agɨl gos nɨgup.
